lead_paragraph: In addition to timing batters going from home to first and runners sprinting from first to third, baseball might have a new drill this spring training: the race from the dugout to the pitcher's mound.

headline.print_headline: On Your Mark, Get Set: Managers Ready for Mound Sprints
headline.main: On Your Mark, Get Set: Managers Ready for Mound Sprints
